topic.title: D4ST Development Guide
topic.shortdesc: How to set up and manage your D4ST Docker development environment.

body.p: Developing the D4ST Docker components requires setting up your local Docker containers to use local versions of files rather than the versions included directly in the containers as distributed. Once you have this set up then it's reasonably easy to make code changes and see them reflected in your running Docker containers without having to rebuild or restart the containers.
